text: BACC may stand for: * Bachelor of Accountancy (B.Acc.), an academic degree * Baccalauréat, French high school diploma * Bangkok Art and Culture Centre, a contemporary arts museum in Bangkok, Thailand * Bay Area Climate Collaborative, a non-profit organization in the San Francisco Bay Area * Billiards Association and Control Council, a now defunct governing body of professional snooker and English billiards * Blocco Automatico a Correnti Codificate, an Italian train protection system * Broadcast Advertising Clearance Centre, a former British non-government organization responsible for pre-approving television commercials
title: BACC
